tool_description: REST API that serves uniformly and well formatted jokes in JSON, XML, YAML or plain text format that also offers a great variety of filtering methods
name: JokeAPI v2
title: JokeAPI v2

api_list.name: Get Joke
api_list.description: This is the endpoint you need to call to get a joke.

required_parameters.name: categories
required_parameters.description: A single category or comma-separated list of categories or the value Any to get jokes of a random category

optional_parameters.name: contains
optional_parameters.description: If specified, only jokes that contain this string will be served. Value needs to be percent-encoded.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Will make JokeAPI only serve jokes with this joke type. Leave empty to randomly select a type.

optional_parameters.name: idRange
optional_parameters.description: A single ID or range of IDs to serve jokes from

optional_parameters.name: blacklistFlags
optional_parameters.description: A single or comma-separated list of blacklist flags

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The file format the joke should be served with

optional_parameters.name: safe-mode
optional_parameters.description: A value-less parameter, that, if present, will tell JokeAPI to try its hardest not to serve any offensive jokes. By default, every joke that has one or more flags set to true is considered unsafe, in addition to a few more hand-picked ones.

api_list.name: Info
api_list.description: This endpoint provides some information on JokeAPI

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The file format the joke should be served with

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list / an array of all available joke categories

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The file format the joke should be served with. More info: https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/#response-formats

api_list.name: Ping
api_list.description: This endpoint is intended for external uptime monitoring but you can also use it if you want to.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The file format the joke should be served with. More info: https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/#response-formats

api_list.name: Flags
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list / an array of all available blacklist flags

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The file format the joke should be served with. More info: https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/#response-formats

api_list.name: Formats
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list / an array of all available response formats

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The file format the joke should be served with. More info: https://sv443.net/jokeapi/v2/#response-formats
